; >>>> start of diplomacy section <<<<
;DS_ALLIED			= 0	
;DS_SUSPICIOUS		= 100
;DS_NEUTRAL			= 200
;DS_HOSTILE			= 400
;DS_AT_WAR			= 600

;core views
;greek - greek
core_attitudes		romans_julii,		-600		romans_brutii, romans_scipii, romans_senate, macedon, egypt, seleucid, carthage, parthia, gauls, pontus
core_attitudes		romans_brutii,		-600		romans_julii, romans_scipii, romans_senate, macedon, egypt, seleucid, carthage, parthia, gauls, pontus
core_attitudes		romans_scipii,		-600		romans_brutii, romans_julii, romans_senate, macedon, egypt, seleucid, carthage, parthia, gauls, pontus
core_attitudes		romans_senate,		-600		romans_brutii, romans_scipii, romans_julii, macedon, egypt, seleucid, carthage, parthia, gauls, pontus
core_attitudes		macedon,		-600		romans_brutii, romans_scipii, romans_senate, romans_julii, egypt, seleucid, carthage, parthia, gauls, pontus
core_attitudes		egypt,		-600		romans_brutii, romans_scipii, romans_senate, macedon, romans_julii, seleucid, carthage, parthia, gauls, pontus
core_attitudes		seleucid,		100		romans_brutii, romans_scipii, romans_senate, macedon, egypt, romans_julii, carthage, parthia, gauls, pontus
core_attitudes		carthage,		100		romans_brutii, romans_scipii, romans_senate, macedon, egypt, seleucid, romans_julii, parthia, gauls, pontus
core_attitudes		parthia,		100		romans_brutii, romans_scipii, romans_senate, macedon, egypt, seleucid, carthage, romans_julii, gauls, pontus
core_attitudes		gauls,		100		romans_brutii, romans_scipii, romans_senate, macedon, egypt, seleucid, carthage, parthia, romans_julii, pontus
core_attitudes		pontus,		100		romans_brutii, romans_scipii, romans_senate, macedon, egypt, seleucid, carthage, parthia, romans_julii

core_attitudes		romans_julii,		100		germans
core_attitudes		germans,		600		romans_julii
core_attitudes		germans,		600		slave
core_attitudes		germans,		600		britons, armenia, dacia, spain
core_attitudes		germans,		100		romans_brutii, romans_scipii, romans_senate, macedon, egypt, seleucid, carthage, parthia, gauls, pontus

core_attitudes		britons,		200		germans

core_attitudes		dacia,		200		germans
core_attitudes		spain,		200		germans

;eastern - greek
core_attitudes		britons,		600		romans_julii, romans_brutii, romans_scipii, romans_senate
core_attitudes		britons,		600		macedon, egypt, seleucid, carthage, parthia, gauls, pontus
core_attitudes		armenia,		600		romans_julii, romans_brutii, romans_scipii, romans_senate, macedon, egypt, seleucid, carthage, parthia, gauls, pontus
core_attitudes		dacia,		600		romans_julii, romans_brutii, romans_scipii, romans_senate, macedon, egypt, seleucid, carthage, parthia, gauls, pontus
core_attitudes		spain,		600		romans_julii, romans_brutii, romans_scipii, romans_senate, macedon, egypt, seleucid, carthage, parthia, gauls, pontus

;pirates
core_attitudes		slave,		400		romans_julii, romans_brutii, romans_scipii, romans_senate, macedon, egypt, seleucid, carthage, parthia, gauls, britons, armenia, dacia, spain, pontus
